label: 治天の君
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: ちてん の きみ
説明文: Literally,the one who governs," this term described the individual who possessed sovereign authority in medieval Japan. Was most often a senior retired emperor, but could also be a reigning emperor. the lord who rules the realm."
